author: OSXDaily
excerpt: AirTags are powerful and handy personal trackers for being able to track and locate your possessions with the Find My network, whether you’re keeping an eye on your luggage, purse, briefcase,…
text: AirTags are powerful and handy personal trackers for being able to track and locate your possessions with the Find My network, whether you’re keeping an eye on your luggage, purse, briefcase, car, bike, scooter, a dog, cat, horse, cow (hey why not?), package, or just about anything else you can imagine would be useful to track. Right now Amazon is selling an AirTag 4-pack for just $65, which is $16 per AirTag, and the lowest price ever seen for a 4-pack, down from the $99 retail price. With AirTags this cheap you might as well grab a few and try them out! AirTags – 4-pack – $65 (down from $99) Apple Watch Series 10 – $329 (down from $399) While you’re shopping around, you might also consider getting the latest edition of Apple Watch, Series 10. The 10th Apple Watch features an always-on 42mm display, all day battery life, sleep tracking, fitness tracking, activity tracking, step counter / pedometer, heart rate monitor, ECG, crash detection with emergency SOS, fall detection with emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, water resistance, voice control, pinch gestures, Siri commands, and much more. You can find the nicely discounted price in various color and band options, so check out which you prefer. Get Apple Watch Series 9 for $329 (check out color options, down from $399 MSRP) FTC: OSXDaily is an affiliate partner with Amazon, meaning if you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment which goes towards keeping the site running.
html:
AirTags are powerful and handy personal trackers for being able to track and locate your possessions with the Find My network, whether you’re keeping an eye on your luggage, purse, briefcase, car, bike, scooter, a dog, cat, horse, cow (hey why not?), package, or just about anything else you can imagine would be useful to track. Right now Amazon is selling an AirTag 4-pack for just $65, which is $16 per AirTag, and the lowest price ever seen for a 4-pack, down from the $99 retail price. With AirTags this cheap you might as well grab a few and try them out!

  • AirTags – 4-pack – $65 (down from $99)

Apple Watch Series 10 – $329 (down from $399)

While you’re shopping around, you might also consider getting the latest edition of Apple Watch, Series 10. The 10th Apple Watch features an always-on 42mm display, all day battery life, sleep tracking, fitness tracking, activity tracking, step counter / pedometer, heart rate monitor, ECG, crash detection with emergency SOS, fall detection with emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, water resistance, voice control, pinch gestures, Siri commands, and much more. You can find the nicely discounted price in various color and band options, so check out which you prefer.

  • Get Apple Watch Series 9 for $329 (check out color options, down from $399 MSRP)

FTC: OSXDaily is an affiliate partner with Amazon, meaning if you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment which goes towards keeping the site running.
